front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Network Reference Model and Functional Description of IEEE 802(R) Access Network

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: An access network (which connects terminals to their access routers) utilizing technologies based on the family of IEEE 802(R) standards is specified in this recommended practice. An access network reference model (NRM) that includes entities and reference points along with behavioral and functional descriptions of communications among those entities is provided in this recommended practice. (The PDF of this standard is available at no cost to you compliments of the IEEE GET program https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/browse/standards/get-program/page/series?id=68).
